Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This product holds great value to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional product for $180. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product and provides you with an opportunity to experience its benefits at a special rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this transaction happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
